title: tEDariya selvamE vA tingaL shaDaimuDi
sahitya:
tEDariya selvamE vA tingaL shaDaimuDi gangai aNindiDumengal irai tarum ingitamE


anupallavi

  nIDoLi mahEndra nIlamaNi kUTTi nErtti perum makuTam Araiyum shUTTi 
kUDa un neTriyiDai sindUram tITTi kozhi nIrum kumkumamum tITTi mukuramum kATTi
kottoDu maNam kadamba malar mAlaiyum muttamiDum vaghaiyAra
kundam aravindam makarandamoDu kandamura vindaiyaNi munduravumAgha
kuru naghaiyadaram polivurak-kaNDa koLLaiyAi pOna manam kUDa 
adhika marai vidhigaL pala nidhiyariyum paDi muyalamadiya mukha ninadu kazhal  padiyavena engum


caraNam    mAmanum unakkenru marakatat-toTTil onru makuTam mEl shumandu vandAn 
bhU maghaL unaik-konji puNNiyam peravenru porppuDai vIDAru tandAL
sOman talaikkaNinda sundarat-tandaiyO vAmamirukka iDam tandAn
nAmaghaL tamizh tandAL nAnmukhan shiram tandAn nAnenna taruvEnO endAi
jnAna paNDita sharavaNabhava guha nAda enavishai pADa 
nAmamurai pADum aDiyavar aghalA jnAnamura engum
